00106    BeTrgPollData& setStartTime(struct tm* startTime, int startTimemus) 
00107    {
00108 
00109      //Starttime year month day
00110      int startTimeymd(0);
00111      startTimeymd = startTimeymd | ( ( (startTime->tm_year + TM_YEARSTART) & 0xffff) << YEARSHIFT) 
00112                                  | ( ( (startTime->tm_mon + 1) & 0xff) << MONTHSHIFT)
00113                                  | ( (  startTime->tm_mday & 0xff) << DAYSHIFT);  
00114 
00115 
00116      //Starttime hour minute second
00117      int startTimehms(0);
00118      startTimehms = startTimehms | ( (startTime->tm_hour & 0xff) << HOURSHIFT)
00119                                  | ( (startTime->tm_min  & 0xff) << MINUTESHIFT)
00120                                  | ( (startTime->tm_sec  & 0xff) << SECONDSHIFT);  
00121 
00122 
00123      obj()->setIntVal(kBeTrgPollstartTimeymd, startTimeymd);
00124      obj()->setIntVal(kBeTrgPollstartTimehms, startTimehms);
00125      //... and the microseconds
00126      obj()->setIntVal(kBeTrgPollstartTimemus, startTimemus);
00127      return *this;
00128    }
00129 
00132    LCTime getStartTime() 
00133    {
00134 
00135      int starttimeymd(obj()->getIntVal(kBeTrgPollstartTimeymd));
00136      int starttimehms(obj()->getIntVal(kBeTrgPollstartTimehms));
00137 
00138      //composition of an intermediate LCTime object in order
00139      //to get everything up to seconds in nanosecs.
00140      LCTime init(  (starttimeymd >> YEARSHIFT) & 0xffff,
00141                    (starttimeymd >> MONTHSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00142                    (starttimeymd >> DAYSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00143                    (starttimehms >> HOURSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00144                    (starttimehms >> MINUTESHIFT) & 0xff,     
00145                    (starttimehms >> SECONDSHIFT) & 0xff );
00146      //Add the microseconds
00147      long64 starttimemus = static_cast<long64>(obj()->getIntVal(kBeTrgPollstartTimemus));        
00148      LCTime finaltime(init.timeStamp() + starttimemus*1000);
00149      return finaltime;
00150 
00151    }
00152 
00156    BeTrgPollData& setEndTime(struct tm* endTime, int endTimemus) 
00157    {
00158 
00159      int endTimeymd(0);
00160      endTimeymd = endTimeymd | ( ( (endTime->tm_year + TM_YEARSTART ) & 0xffff) << YEARSHIFT)
00161                              | ( ( (endTime->tm_mon +1) & 0xff) << MONTHSHIFT)
00162                              | ( (endTime->tm_mday & 0xff) << DAYSHIFT);  
00163 
00164      int endTimehms(0);
00165      endTimehms = endTimehms | ( (endTime->tm_hour & 0xff) << HOURSHIFT)
00166                              | ( (endTime->tm_min  & 0xff) << MINUTESHIFT)
00167                              | ( (endTime->tm_sec  & 0xff) << SECONDSHIFT);  
00168 
00169 
00170      obj()->setIntVal(kBeTrgPollendTimeymd, endTimeymd);
00171      obj()->setIntVal(kBeTrgPollendTimehms, endTimehms);
00172      obj()->setIntVal(kBeTrgPollendTimemus, endTimemus);
00173 
00174      return *this;
00175    }
00176 
00180    LCTime getEndTime() 
00181    {
00182 
00183      //composition of an intermediate LCTime object in order
00184      //to get everything up to seconds in nanosecs.
00185      int endtimeymd(obj()->getIntVal(kBeTrgPollendTimeymd));
00186      int endtimehms(obj()->getIntVal(kBeTrgPollendTimehms));
00187 
00188      LCTime init(  (endtimeymd >> YEARSHIFT) & 0xffff,
00189                    (endtimeymd >> MONTHSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00190                    (endtimeymd >> DAYSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00191                    (endtimehms >> HOURSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00192                    (endtimehms >> MINUTESHIFT) & 0xff,     
00193                    (endtimehms >> SECONDSHIFT) & 0xff );
00194 
00195      //Add the microseconds
00196      long64 endtimemus = static_cast<long64>(obj()->getIntVal(kBeTrgPollendTimemus));        
00197      LCTime finaltime(init.timeStamp() + endtimemus*1000);
00198 
00199      return finaltime;
00200 
00201    }

00205    BeTrgPollData& setMaximumTime(int maxTimesec, int maxTimemus) 
00206    {
00207 
00208      //Set secs and musecs seperately
00209      obj()->setIntVal(kBeTrgPollmaxTimesec, maxTimesec);
00210      obj()->setIntVal(kBeTrgPollmaxTimemus, maxTimemus);
00211      return *this;
00212    }

00275    {
00276       return "int:BoardID, int:RecordLabel, int:startTimeymd, int:startTimehms, int:startTimemus, int:endTimeymd,int:endTimehms, int:endTimemus, int:maximumTimesec, int:maximumTimemus, int:numberOfPolls, int:timeout" ;

00281    std::ostream& print(std::ostream &ostrm)  
00282    {
00283       
00284      ostrm << " BeTrgPollData: "  << std::endl;
00285      ostrm << " Board: " << BoardID(getBoardID()) << std::endl;
00286      ostrm << " Record Label: " << getRecordLabel() << std::endl;
00287      ostrm << " Poll Starttime (UTC): " << getStartTime().getDateString() << std::endl; 
00288      ostrm << " Poll Endtime (UTC): " << getEndTime().getDateString() << std::endl;
00289      ostrm << " Poll Maximumtime: " << getMaximumTimeSec() << "." << getMaximumTimeMus()<< std::endl; 
00290      ostrm << " Number of Polls: " << getNumberOfPolls() << std::endl;
00291      ostrm << " is Timeout? " << isTimeout() << std::endl;
00292      
00293      return ostrm;
00294    }
